parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Default value: 1. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: DdosRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the asset.

parameters.name: DdosStatus
parameters.description:
The DDoS mitigation status of the asset. Valid values:

*   **defense**: queries assets for which traffic scrubbing is performed.
*   **blackhole**: queries assets for which blackhole filtering is triggered.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the RDS Custom instance to which the asset to query is added.

parameters.name: InstanceIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the asset to query.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the RDS Custom instance to which the asset to query is added.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description: The type of the asset that is assigned a public IP address. Set the value to **ecs**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of instances on each page.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the RDS Custom instance resides.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to **ecs**.
